field.label: Cache Type
field.helpText: If not using default Cache, please provide an implementation Class

field.label: Maximum Heap or Configuration file (EHCache)
field.helpText: If using EHCache, you can provide the maximum object of Object (key-value pair) that can be stored in this Cache or the full path of a configuration file (EHCache v3)

field.label: Hosts
field.helpText: For Redis Standalone, please provide the host and port separate with a semi-colon. For Redis Clustered, please provide the list of the hosts with a comma to separate them. For instance: host1:port1,host2:port2

field.label: Use SSL
field.helpText: For Redis (Azure), you can provide enable this option to use SSL. Please also make sure you are using the correct SSL Port (should be 6380)

field.label: Password
field.helpText: For Redis, you can provide a password (Access Key for Azure Redis Caches)

field.label: Dynamics Process Properties Filter
field.helpText: For the Automatic Key Computation (for RESTFul APIs), you can set the regular expression to filter HTTP queries and HTTP parameters

field.label: Apply SHA Hashing during Automatic Key Computation
field.helpText: Apply SHA Hashing during Automatic Key Computation

field.label: Name of the Cache Object
field.helpText: Please provide the name of the Cache, all key-value pairs will reside in this Cache

field.label: Automatic Key Computation
field.helpText: Enable Automatic Key Computation (for RESTFul APIs), please uncheck for non-API Processes

field.label: Wrap response in XML Profile (ID and Value elements)
field.helpText: Wrap ID and Value element from Cache in a XML object (For use in Function to get the Value)

field.label: Throw Exception when not found
field.helpText: Throw Exception when no result if found in the Cache. You will have to Catch the Exception and query the Backend System
